Activity: Log in, check emails, and review the week's progress. Grab a coffee and reflect on the accomplishments of the week.
Begin adding visual design enhancements to all UI elements: main menu, HUD, inventory, and settings screens. Apply the established color palette, typography, and visual style.
Share the updated UI designs with the art team (@cart-1, @3dmod-2, @tart-1) for feedback and alignment on the overall visual direction. Subject: UI Visual Design Review.
Incorporate feedback from the art team and make any necessary adjustments to the visual design.
Prepare a presentation showcasing the UI designs and prototypes to the entire team. Highlight the key design decisions and user testing feedback.
Present the UI designs and prototypes to the team. Answer questions and gather feedback.
Document all feedback received during the presentation and plan for the next week's tasks, which will likely involve further iteration and refinement of the UI based on team feedback.
Submit the weekly report and wish everyone a happy weekend!
